definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: Roh Moo-hyun made highly positive comments on China's foreign policy of equality, mutual benefits and good-neighborliness towards neighboring countries.
sentences.chinese: 卢武铉高度评价中国平等互利的睦邻周边外交政策。

sentences.english: Our factory pursues the principle of independence, initiative and self-reliance.
sentences.chinese: 应该坚持独立自主和平等互利原则。

sentences.english: China always upholds the principle of mutual benefit on an equal footing in trade and economic cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 中国开展对外经贸合作一直秉持平等互利原则。

sentences.english: We trade with people in all countries on the basis of equality and mutual benefit.
sentences.chinese: 我们在平等互利的基础上和各国人民进行贸易。

definition: Zhou Enlai's Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence/1954 Panchsheel series of agreements between PRC and India
pinyin: he2 ping2 gong4 chu3 wu3 xiang4 yuan2 ze2

definition: to seek common ground, putting differences aside (idiom)
peaceful coexistence of nations, societies etc
